Ougon Bat: A golden warrior wearing a cape and a scepter, Ougon Bat was a protector spirit  from Atlantis reanimated by a scientist and his friends (specially the sweet Marie) from his tomb covered in hieroglyphics. His entry was heralded by a golden bat and a sinister laugh and he would put good use of his super powers to combat the evil forces of Dr. Zero.
